name: Leonardo Van Meerten
description: OK dear my name Leonardo Aurick Van Meerten I’m 55 years old, from Canada, I was born in Germany I am the only child of my parents, my mother is from Germany and my father is Canada, I lost them years ago,I am a architectural and am also into gallery of art also, my job is kind of demanding, but I still have time for my love ones. I have a daughter, whose name his Emma she is 10 years old, i lost my wife 5 years ago, I am a very affectionate and loving man searching for true love based on mutual respect, honesty,loyalty,trust.
